sessions.name: Directives Masterclass
sessions.abstract: In this session you will learn the ins & outs of directives!

sessions.name: Scopes for Fun & Profit
sessions.abstract: This session will take a closer look at scopes. Learn what they do, how they do it, and how to get them to do it for you.

sessions.name: Well Behaved Controllers
sessions.abstract: Controlelrs are the beginning of everything Angular does. Learn to craft controllers that will win the respect of your friends & neightbors.
